description: Bitcloud Pro aims to become the world's largest aggregate liquidity trading platform with intelligent trading tools. Bitcloud Pro describes itself as a one-stop digital asset wealth management platform. Its parent company reportedly holds a Philippines Central Bank issued Digital Asset Exchange license and has strategic cooperation with several national banks. Bitcloud Pro claims to provide AML compliant fiat payment gateways across the G10 currencies as well as VISA card issuance and deposits. Bitcloud Pro’s trading solution aggregates liquidity from exchanges and brings institutional-grade trading algorithms to mobile phones.
name: Bitcloud Pro
